@TonyHinton2016 @thecoastguy @GBNEWS @GretaThunberg The FACT is that (physics works this way), if the affects of a nuclear power accident extend beyond the borders of the country in conflict (which they will 99.9% of the time -take the Pacific re: #Fukushima etc.-), then preventing such "accidents" is EVERYONE'S responsibility!!!
